column4: can anyone tell me if I can 'mask" my flash player so web pages think it is v8 & stop telling me to upgrade
you want the installer for linux
excellent .. thank you .. any special tips for downloading it or is it pretty straightforward?
anything I need to know to run the installer on ubuntu ?
put the .so file in your firefox plugins directory
plugins directory is in .mozilla/ i think
have downloaded Beta 9 flash and there is only an . so & readme, there is no install script to make executable
the .so file goes in your firefox plugin directory
after flash 7 is gone, the new .so file goes in /usr/lib/firefox/plugins.  You will need to mv it as root.
is there a way to run Ubuntu File Mgr as sudo or root ? (i'm a newb and need a gui)
